p: The nanoprecipitation method was efficient in encapsulating Z. riedelianum fruit essential oils since the colloidal suspensions exhibited EE% â‰¥ 98.66% ( Table 3). Previous studies reported similar results using the same method and the PCL polymer; for instance, EE% was ~99% for rosemary essential oil [ 33] and greater than 96% for Z. rhoifolium leaf essential oil [ 34]. Forim et al. [ 23] used a new, nanoprecipitation-based method capable of encapsulating 100% of neem extract.
